mapper.select: select genre_code as genreCode, genre_name as genreName From genre
mapper.insert: insert into book( library_id, genre_code, book_name, book_author, book_publisher ) values( #{libraryId}, #{genreCode}, #{bookName}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookPublisher} )
mapper.select: select book_code as bookCode, book_name as bookName, book_author as bookAuthor, book_publisher as bookPublisher, genre_code as genreCode from book where book_code=#{bookCode}
